Package com.adidas.connect.ui.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountAuthenticatorActivityCompat
    Base class for implementing an Activity that is used to help implement an AbstractAccountAuthenticator.
    BlurBackgroundActivity
    Activity that blurs its window background, has a fragment container and abitility to close by clicking the close button or on the background.
    CreatePasswordActivity
    Activity with a single fragment to create a password.
    EditAddressActivity
    Activity to edit and delete an address.
    EditDateOfBirthActivity
    Activity that shows two inputs sequentially, for the current and new password.
    EditDateOfBirthActivity.Builder  
    EditGenderActivity
    Activity that shows two inputs sequentially, for the current and new password.
    EditGenderActivity.Builder  
    EditNameActivity
    Activity that shows two inputs sequentially, for the current and new password.
    EditNameActivity.Builder  
    EditProfileActivity
    Activity that shows two inputs sequentially, for the current and new password.
    EditProfileActivity.Builder  
    GetEmailActivity
    Activity to request user email and confirm legal age.
    HandleDeepLinkingActivity  
    InputStep
    Abstract class that should be implemented by any InputStep.
    NewInputStepsActivity
    Base class for activities that show a sequence of inputs.
    ProfileActivity  
    ProfileActivity.Builder  
    SetPasswordActivity
    Activity that shows two inputs sequentially, for the current and new password.
    StandaloneEditFieldActivity
    Activity that shows two inputs sequentially, for the current and new password.
    StandaloneEditFieldActivity.Builder  
    TestActivity
